Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid

package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid
A light-weight implementation of ADA's rendezvous pattern. Also includes a generic implementation of a finite-state machine.
Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 1 juin 2021
